div.p: This study was funded by the Research Council of Norway (RCN: POLARPROG project 216051, Centre of Excellence project 223257, KLIMAFORSK project 244647, and FRIMEDBIO project 276080). Data collection was financed by the Norwegian Institute for Nature Research, Macaulay Development Trust, James Hutton Institute, UK Natural Environment Research Council (NERC), University Centre in Svalbard (UNIS), and RCN. We thank the Norwegian Meteorological Institute for weather data, the Governor of Svalbard for permission to do field work, and UNIS for logistics support.
